天然肥胖斗士：咖啡、茶和可可如何对抗体重增加《食品科学当前研究》中的一篇综述探讨了咖啡、茶和可可中的生物活性化合物如何通过抑制白色脂肪生成和促进棕色脂肪生成和脂肪分解来对抗肥胖。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240422/Natural-obesity-fighters-How-coffee-tea-and-cocoa-combat-weight-gain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240422/Natural-obesity-fighters-How-coffee-tea-and-cocoa-combat-weight-gain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a634256a-43e1-4001-916e-30e7bbf7e5a2 Mon, 22 Apr 2024 20:03:00 -0400 Natural obesity fighters: How coffee, tea, and cocoa combat weight gain
学业压力与青少年抑郁风险较高有关《柳叶刀儿童与青少年健康》上的一项研究将青少年的学业成就目标与抑郁风险增加联系起来，表明超越同龄人的压力可能会加剧抑郁症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240422/Academic-Pressure-linked-to-higher-depression-risk-in-teens.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240422/Academic-Pressure-linked-to-higher-depression-risk-in-teens.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=65a025cf-a196-40d6-88e5-24f68f660bda Mon, 22 Apr 2024 19:31:00 -0400 Academic pressure linked to higher depression risk in teens

星形胶质细胞被发现在癫痫神经元过度活跃中发挥关键作用​癫痫症患者会遭受意外癫痫发作，影响了大约 1% 的人口。这些癫痫发作通常涉及重复和过度的神经元放电，其背后的触发因素仍然知之甚少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240422/Astrologies-found-to-play-pivotal-role-in-epileptic-neuronal-hyperactivity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240422/Astrologies-found-to-play-pivotal-role-in-epileptic-neuronal-hyperactivity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=323c3bef-deaa-4a00-9d78-ddcdf5073c04 Mon, 22 Apr 2024 09:57:00 -0400 Astrocytes found to play pivotal role in epileptic neuronal hyperactivity
